Name: Meteor
Desc: Summons a meteor from the sky, dealing great Fire damage. Also, permanently makes skills except for Fire Aura create a chance of dropping a meteor onto enemies, dealing damage.

Desc.Old: Summons a meteorite from the sky onto a group of enemies, inflicting great Fire damage. Attacks with skills except Fire Aura permanently create a chance of dropping a meteor onto a single enemy.
Desc.New: Summons a meteor from the sky, dealing great Fire damage. Also, permanently makes skills except for Fire Aura create a chance of dropping a meteor onto enemies, dealing damage.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 300. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 315% damage 12 times. Cooldown: 45 sec.
[Passive Effects: [Final Attack Typed Skill] With direct attack skills in use, this skill creates a 60% chance of dropping a meteor onto a single enemy, inflicting 220% damage.]
H.New:
MP Cost: 300. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 315% Damage 12 times.
Cooldown: 45 sec.
[Passive Effects: [Final Attack Type Skill] Direct Attack skill hits create a 60% chance of dropping a meteor that attacks at 220% Damage.]

[Passive Effects: [Final Attack Typed Skill] With direct attack skills in use, this skill creates a 60% chance of dropping a meteor onto a single enemy, inflicting 220% damage.]
